Text.Page:
Date unknown. Low visibility

I'm still observing the Mournwings and Murderwings.

I was able to notice that one of the Mournwing's jewel glands has contracted.

I've been keeping an eye on the others, but only one of them was noticeable.

I keep tracking the one with the contracted jewel gland and try to search for other unusual butterflies if possible.Go to next pageClose the report

Date unknown. High visibility

I've been following the butterfly all night.

That particular butterfly flew off towards Exodor.

I was also able to witness a group of butterflies with contracted jewel glands flying towards Exodor.

This can't be just a coincidence. I'm sure that this must be some kind of a homing instinct.

* Supplemental:
I've reported this to the Mysterium.Go to previous pageGo to next pageClose the report

Date unknown. High powder concentration.

The Mysterium was impressed with my report and requested additional experiments.

I hung a heavily weighted sack to one of the butterflies with a contracted jewel gland to check if the weight creates any difficulties while flying.

Surprisingly, the butterfly was able to take its flight to Exodor without any trouble.

This should mean that anyone could take a flight to Exodor riding these butterflies.Go to previous pageClose the report
